languages.text: "Этот слуга видел все своими глазами". {n}Старик мнется, не сразу решаясь продолжить.{/n} "Не жалкой пылинке под пятой посланников Бога-орла рассуждать о случившемся... Однако этот слуга почувствовал всем нутром, как ярость овладела Звездорожденным. И его закованный-в-сталь страж упивался гневом своего бога".

traits.locale_text: "Этот слуга видел все своими глазами". {n}Старик мнется, не сразу решаясь продолжить.{/n} "Не жалкой пылинке под пятой посланников Бога-орла рассуждать о случившемся... Однако этот слуга почувствовал всем нутром, как ярость овладела Звездорожденным. И его закованный-в-сталь страж упивался гневом своего бога".

languages.text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."
languages.original_text: "Этот слуга видел все своими глазами". {n}Старик мнется, не сразу решаясь продолжить.{/n} "Не жалкой пылинке под пятой посланников Бога-орла рассуждать о случившемся... Однако этот слуга почувствовал всем нутром, как ярость овладела Звездорожденным. И его закованный-в-сталь страж упивался гневом своего бога".

traits.locale_text: "This servant had seen everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then starts talking again.{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of the Heavenly Envoy of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant had sensed, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

"This servant had seen everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then starts talking again.{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of the Heavenly Envoy of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant had sensed, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

However, this servant had sensed, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

However, this servant had sensed, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

"This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

"This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

languages.text: «Este siervo lo vio todo con sus propios ojos». {n}El anciano titubea un instante, y luego prosigue su narración.{/n} «Quizá no sea apropiado para una simple mota de polvo bajo la suela {mf|del Emisario|de la Emisaria} Celestial del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas meditar sobre lo ocurrido... Pero este siervo había percibido con todo su ser la furia que poseía al Hijo de las Estrellas en aquel momento. Y el guardián acorazado se deleitaba con la cólera de su deidad».
languages.original_text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

traits.locale_text: «Este siervo lo vio todo con sus propios ojos». {n}El anciano titubea un instante, y luego prosigue su narración.{/n} «Quizá no sea apropiado para una simple mota de polvo bajo la suela {mf|del Emisario|de la Emisaria} Celestial del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas meditar sobre lo ocurrido... Pero este siervo había percibido con todo su ser la furia que poseía al Hijo de las Estrellas en aquel momento. Y el guardián acorazado se deleitaba con la cólera de su deidad».

languages.text: “此仆人亲眼看到了这一切。”{n}老人犹豫片刻，随后继续开了口。{/n}“或许，对于双头鹰神的圣使脚下的一粒尘土来说，思索这样的行为不合时宜……然而，此仆人曾全身心地感觉到星裔当时的愤怒，而那位铁甲卫士完全沉醉于神明的愤怒之中。”
languages.original_text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

traits.locale_text: “此仆人亲眼看到了这一切。”{n}老人犹豫片刻，随后继续说了起来。{/n}“或许，对于双头鹰神的天使脚下的一粒尘土来说，思索这样的行为不合时宜……然而，此仆人曾全身心地感觉到星裔当时的愤怒，而那位铁甲卫士完全沉醉于神明的愤怒之中。”

languages.text: « Ce serviteur a tout vu de ses propres yeux. » {n}Le vieillard hésite un instant, puis reprend la parole.{/n} « Il est sans doute inapproprié, pour un misérable grain de poussière sous le talon de l'émissaire céleste de l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes, de faire part de ses impressions... Cependant, ce serviteur a clairement ressenti toute la rage qui s'est emparée du Stellaire à ce moment. Le gardien cuirassé, lui, s'est délecté de la colère de son dieu. »
languages.original_text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serviteur a tout vu de ses propres yeux. » {n}Le vieil homme hésite un instant, puis reprend la parole.{/n} « Il est sans doute inapproprié, pour un misérable grain de poussière sous le talon de l'émissaire céleste de l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes, de faire part de ses impressions... Cependant, ce serviteur a clairement ressenti toute la rage qui s'est emparée du Stellaire à ce moment. Le gardien cuirassé, lui, s'est délecté de la colère de son dieu. »

languages.text: 「このしもべは、この二つの目ですべてを見た」{n}老人はためらうように言葉を区切ると、再び話す。{/n}「双頭の鷲神の天の先駆者の、踵を踏んだだけのただの汚れに過ぎない者が、その所業を慨嘆するのは適切ではないのかもしれない…しかし、このしもべは全身全霊で、その瞬間にスターボーンが抱いていた怒りを感じ取っていた。そして、装甲のガーディアンは神の怒りを喜んだのだ」
languages.original_text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

traits.locale_text: 「このしもべは、この二つの目ですべてを見た」{n}老人はためらうように言葉を区切ると、再び話す。{/n}「双頭の鷲神の天の先駆者の、踵を踏んだだけのただの汚れに過ぎない者が、その所業を慨嘆するのは適切ではないのかもしれない…しかし、このしもべは全身全霊で、その瞬間にスターボーンが抱いていた怒りを感じ取っていた。そして、装甲のガーディアンは神の怒りを喜んだのだ」

languages.text: "Dieser Diener hat alles mit seinen eigenen Augen gesehen." {n}Der alte Mann zögert und fährt dann fort:{/n} "Es geziemt sich vielleicht nicht für ein bloßes Staubkörnchen unter den Füßen des Himmel-Herolds des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes, darüber nachzusinnen ... Doch dieser Diener hat mit seinem gesamten Wesen gespürt, welcher Zorn den Sternengeborenen in diesem Augenblick ergriffen hatte. Und der in Eisen gekleidete Wächter suhlte sich im Zorn seines Gottes."
languages.original_text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Diener hat alles mit seinen eigenen Augen gesehen." {n}Der alte Mann stockt und spricht dann weiter.{/n} "Es geziemt sich vielleicht nicht für ein bloßes Staubkörnchen unter den Füßen {mf|der|der} himmlischen Gesandten des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes, darüber nachzusinnen ... Doch dieser Diener hat mit seinem gesamten Wesen gespürt, welcher Zorn den Sternengeborenen in diesem Augenblick ergriffen hatte. Und der in Eisen gekleidete Wächter suhlte sich im Zorn seines Gottes."

languages.text: "Bu hizmetkâr, her şeyi iki gözüyle birden gördü." {n}İhtiyar adam, tereddütle duraksamasının ardından devam ediyor.{/n} "Çift Başlı Kartal Tanrı'nın Gök Müjdecisi'nin ayaklarının altında leke olan çamurdan farksız birinin yaşananlara kafa yorması, belki de münasip kaçmaz ama... Bu hizmetkâr, tüm varlığıyla Yıldızdoğan'ı o anda ele geçiren öfkeyi hissetti. Demir kaplı muhafız ise tanrısının gazabından keyif aldı."
languages.original_text: "This servant saw everything with his own two eyes." {n}The old man pauses in hesitation, then continues,{/n} "It is not proper, perhaps, for a mere speck of dirt under the heels of a Sky-Herald of the Two-Headed Eagle-God, to muse upon the deed... However, this servant did sense, with his entire being, the rage that possessed the Starborn at that moment. And the iron-clad guardian revelled in his god's wrath."
